statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE suspicious_activity = TRUE;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, account_id FROM transactions WHERE suspicious_activity = FALSE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, suspicious_activity FROM transactions WHERE suspicious_activity = true AND transaction_date < '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 12345 AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount, account_id FROM transactions WHERE flag_suspicious = TRUE
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE date between '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN flagged_activities ON transactions.transaction_id = flagged_activities.transaction_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions INNER JOIN flagged_activities ON transactions.transaction_id = flagged_activities.transaction_id;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE flag_suspicious = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date, description FROM transactions LEFT JOIN flagged_activities ON transactions.transaction_id = flagged_activities.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM accounts WHERE account_type='Savings';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE flag=TRUE;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC, account_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_type, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, flag FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' AND balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM flags WHERE flag_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, name, joined_date FROM users WHERE joined_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT activity_id, transaction_id, flag_date FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY flag_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.name FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.name = 'John Doe';
SELECT u.user_id, u.name, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
SELECT ft.flag_id, ft.flag_date, sa.reason FROM flagged_transactions ft LEFT JOIN suspicious_activities sa ON ft.transaction_id = sa.transaction_id WHERE ft.flag_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT description, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND account_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, name, address, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT user_id, description FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
